description: Since RL2 files are only used by the Voyeur video game, you will most likely never encounter them unless you have installed the game on your computer. Voyeur was originally released in 1993 in the Compact Disc-Interactive (CD-i) format, which is an optical disc data storage format supported by CD-i players, such as Philips CD-i. The game was then released a year later in 1994 for MS-DOS and Macintosh computers.
